statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -3 \\ -2 \\ -2 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -11 \\ 16 \\ 7 \\ 9 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 27 \\ -39 \\ -15 \\ -21 \\ -39 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
